name: Mail Cannon (Trijam 179)
description:
The year is 2029.  Society has crumbled, nations have dissolved, and the earth's surface is uninhabitable.  But don't worry!  Amazon has survived, and humanity has migrated to a series of floating islands called Prime Shelters.

Amazon's fulfillment centers are still on the ground, but that's no problem for you - our trusty Amazon Prime Mail-Cannon operator!

Your job is to load orders into the mail cannon and deliver them to the correct Prime Shelter.  Every successful delivery gets you paid!  More difficult deliveries may require a stronger cannon, but lucky for you, you can purchase everything you need to do your job from the store.

This game was made by Earend for Trijam 179 (Floating Islands Theme), including all code, art assets, and sounds.

https://www.twitch.tv/earend
